!http://i0.kym-cdn.com/photos/images/newsfeed/000/963/412/6f3.png!
Honestly girls with horns are cute.[/bq]
Ooooh! What the heck is this? Interesting.[/bq]
It's a new game franchise to replace how castlevania has been butchered and it's going back to it's roots.[/bq]
So it's going to be like what Mighty no 9 was supposed to be for Megaman.
